mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Online School, we strive to provide quality education accessible to everyone, anywhere in the world. Our mission is to equip students with the knowledge and skills that will help them succeed in the rapidly changing digital world.

meta.title: SOnS: about our school
meta.description: An online school offering flexible courses in web development, JavaScript, Node.js, and more.
meta.keywords: education, online school, courses, web development, JavaScript, Node.js
